about.me: I am tacos. I enjoy crypto, I like Proof of Stake blockchains, and I LOVE Cardano.
about.server: Professionally hosted on pool-owned hardware in an independent datacenter with redundant 10GBps uplinks, redundant power supplies, backup generator, and round-the-clock monitoring. 2x8 Core Xeon CPU, 128GB of RAM, mirrored storage.
about.company: Just a few friends with a bunch of ADA--and me, who has a bunch of free time and a bit of ADA.
